title: Dragon kiteshield

properties.name: description
properties.value: A dragon kiteshield is a kiteshield made by combining a dragon sq shield, dragon metal shard, and dragon metal slice at the Dragon Forge after the completion of Dragon Slayer II. This process requires a hammer and 75 Smithing, granting 1,000 Smithing experience. The dragon kiteshield does not require Legends' Quest to wield, despite being created from the dragon sq shield that does.

Item ID21895

A dragon kiteshield is a kiteshield made by combining a dragon sq shield, dragon metal shard, and dragon metal slice at the Dragon Forge after the completion of Dragon Slayer II. This process requires a hammer and 75 Smithing, granting 1,000 Smithing experience. The dragon kiteshield does not require Legends' Quest to wield, despite being created from the dragon sq shield that does.

Players can attach a dragon kiteshield ornament kit, obtained from master clue scrolls, to create a gold-trimmed dragon kiteshield (g). This is only cosmetic, and does not affect the kiteshield's stat bonuses. It can be dismantled, returning the kiteshield and ornament kit.

[[File:Dragon kiteshield detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''dragon kiteshield''' is a [[kiteshield]] made by combining a [[dragon sq shield]], [[dragon metal shard]], and [[dragon metal slice]] at the [[Dragon Forge]] after the completion of [[Dragon Slayer II]]. This process requires a [[hammer]] and 75 [[Smithing]], granting 1,000 Smithing [[experience]]. The dragon kiteshield does not require [[Legends' Quest]] to wield, despite being created from the dragon sq shield that does.

Players can attach a [[dragon kiteshield ornament kit]], obtained from [[master clue scroll]]s, to create a gold-trimmed [[dragon kiteshield (g)]]. This is only cosmetic, and does not affect the kiteshield's stat bonuses. It can be dismantled, returning the kiteshield and ornament kit.
